x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: Deprecate "connect.retrieve_external_link_content" sys property. Two new sys properties "glide.ui.url.external" and "glide.ui.url.external.content" are created for rendering external link and content in Connect.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Replace retrieve external link property
